file_content.text: You best friend Jawa ever have! Maybe only friend, but still best!
You'll be happy to hear the Geonosians have suffered a catastrophic equipment failure.
Jawa lucky to be friends with you! You even tougher than sandcrawler!
The Geonosians will be forced to move on, now. You should be able to return home soon.
You nicest outsider Renishi ever meet! Much nicer than bug-people!
I've dealt with your bug problem.
You best soldier in whole desert!
A little blaster fire, a few explosions, and your bug friends may have been encouraged to move.
You best outsider ever! Renishi get you best deals on slightly used droid parts! Promise!
Jawa never forget how you help! Renishi promise!
Blow up all bug-people equipment! Then Jawa can go home!
You good friend! Help free Jawas! Maybe you help Jawas again?
Bug-people take away Jawa home! Bug-people kill everyone who try to make them go!
Maybe you make bug-people leave so Jawa can go home?
I'm sure I can persuade them to move along one way or another.
I'll take care of it.
Renishi think maybe grenades work better than words on bug-people.
What bug-people?
Big bugs! Skinny. Long faces. Build machines! You know?
The Geonosians are the "bug-people" who drove you from your home?
You mean Geonosians?
Thank you. Now I understand completely. Bug-people. Right.
Well, that clears things up.
I have no idea what you mean.
Not know bug-people? Just look for big bugs. Hard to miss.
Bug-people kill militia men. Militia men have explosives. You take! Militia men not need anymore, anyway.
Blow up bug-people equipment, bug-people leave, yes? Jawa can go home!
Sorry. [Refuse quest]
But... friends? No? Maybe later?
Lots of Jawas missing. Very, very bad thing.
